section.title: com.thealgorithms.misc.ColorContrastRatio Class Reference

para.para: A Java implementation of the offcial W3 documented procedure to calculate contrast ratio between colors on the web. This is used to calculate the readability of a foreground color on top of a background color.

listitem.para: Calculates the contrast ratio between two given colors.
Calculates the relative luminance of a given color.
Calculates the final value for a color to be used in the relative luminance formula as described in step 1.
